attributes.title: Take this off the App Store.
attributes.review: We gen z are finna get this off the App Store. Horrible app for a horrible man. Would give zero stars if possible.

attributes.title: absolutely not
attributes.review: if i could give this 0 stars i would my cat even got scared this isn’t ok, this needs to be taken down and off the app store. this is highly offensive and i’m very allergic to oranges so this makes me itch and not be able to breathe by looking at it. absolutely disgusting.

attributes.title: What in the Sam Hill?!?!
attributes.review: I can’t even believe this app is a thing! How is a Cheeto running an app for president? I just don’t understand the logic of all of this

attributes.title: stole my data
attributes.review: this app stole all my DATA it also hacked my bank account 😔😔 can't believe this 😿😿 I WILL be speaking to the manager about this 🤬🤬 how dare this be legal 🧍‍♀️😩😿🤬🤬

attributes.title: TERRIBLE but not as terrible as the president
attributes.review: When i opened the app I saw the worst thing ever.... A ORANGE CHEETO i didn’t even know that was a thing 😔🤚. it was so bad my cat fell into the microwave 😢  DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP UNLESS YOU WANT THIS TO HAPPEN TO YOU 👁👄👁

attributes.title: no
attributes.review: worse app in the entire app store would rather download flappy bird

attributes.title: Trump is a Chido
attributes.review: Why the heck is Trump Banning TikTok that’s not fair to  all the people on TikTok that has worked hard for all of their followers that all shouldn’t go to waste

attributes.title: cheetos can now create apps?
attributes.review: okay, so i have a question: who ever said it was okay for a cheeto to have an app? i definitely don’t think it’s right and it needs to be taken down immediately. also, gen z will win this war. don’t forget, #savebarron2020, poor kid has to live with a stale cheeto.

attributes.title: Stupid
attributes.review:
This app is why god stays in heaven. This app is the equivalent to a participation trophy. This app reminds of the baby from ice age. This app is the before picture in general. 
Sincerely, 
Disappointed

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: I was disgusted! How horrible can this app be to show a literal Cheeto naked.. my poor eyes 🏃‍♂️I wouldn’t recommend using this app if you don’t want to be traumatized 😵 ily guys stay safe swag yolo🥵
